refnamediv.refpurpose: Enable FOP extensions for version 0.20.5 and earlier

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zero, extensions intended for FOP version 0.20.5 and earlier will be used. At present, this consists of PDF bookmarks.
This parameter can also affect which graphics file formats are supported
If you are using a version of FOP beyond version 0.20.5, then use the fop1.extensions instead.
